column5: See, Naigh. ii, 1 and ; Pāṇ. 7-4, 65 ),  to do repeatedly, RV. ; AV. ; TS. ;  <!!!>Class.<!!!> carkarti or carikarti or carīkarti ([Pāṇ. 7-4, 92 ; Kāś. ]), also carkarīti or
column6: Looks like wrong mark-up. Why so bold? "Class." = forms (of intensive) in Classical Sanskrit.

column5: 11 Final, last. 12 (At the end of comp.) Having anything as ths highest object ...
column6: In the electronic version the 12th meaning should begin in a new line and have the number "12" formatted with bold.

column5: 5 The organ of intelligence, sense, intellect; कच्चिज्ज्ञानानि सर्वणि प्रसन्नानि तवाच्युत Mb. 12. 45. 18.
